title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 154.1 - Corporations affected
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 154.1 - Corporations affected

State Regulations

Every electric or gas and electric corporation having
annual electric operating revenues of $100,000 or over shall establish, provide
and maintain continuing property records of its property used wholly or partly
in electric operations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
154.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
